summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4121 for the improvement of Eastern Avenue, from North 42nd Street to North 45th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49431, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
